Html:
Dear radio man,
Thanks for your great project! As I am new in the map related topics, could you please give me some help. I need to change projection of google hybrid map from MercatorProjection to PlateCarreeProjection.
when I use
PlateCarreeProjection g = new PlateCarreeProjection();
        gmap.MapProvider.Projection = g;
I get the following error message:
"Property or indexer 'GMap.NET.MapProviders.GMapProvider.Projection' cannot be assigned to -- it is read only".
If I use the wrong way, could you please guide me to the right way.
Thanks in advance.
there is no need to change projection, it's constant, create your own provider with your own projection if you need it

Dear radioman
Thanks for your help, But unfortunately, I almost got lost in the code, in different version of dlls, source codes, and etc. could you please kindly give me a step by step guide to do that? And could you please introduce me a site which I can get a working solution file in c# which I can debug the map providers? Because when I remove the GMAP.NET.CORE.dll and add required functions manually, a lot of errors raised and after removing them, no breakpoints in the mapprovider is triggered.
